definition: to wait to fill a vacancy/reserve (candidate)/alternate/substitute
to wait/to inquire after/to watch/season/climate/(old) period of five days
to repair/to patch/to mend/to make up for/to fill (a vacancy)/to supplement

sentences.english: Our football team leads them by two goals.
sentences.chinese: 他只是足球隊的候補隊員。

sentences.english: He made the second string on the footBall team.
sentences.chinese: 他只是足球隊的候補隊員。

sentences.english: I will put you on standby. If any seat is available, we will let you know.
sentences.chinese: 我將把您列爲候補，如果有空座，我們會通知您。

sentences.english: Somebody else could play the second violin part for me.
sentences.chinese: 有人可以代替我做小提琴演奏候補。

sentences.english: Your reservation is already in the standby list.
sentences.chinese: 您的訂位已經在候補名單了裏。

sentences.english: According to Garmaise and Moskowitz, evidence for the alternate theories is weak.
sentences.chinese: 總之，研究證明這三種候補理論的證據都缺乏說服力。

sentences.english: Look at that, could be a candidate for cribs.
sentences.chinese: 看一下，幾乎可以做嬰兒牀的候補了。

sentences.english: Members and alternate members of the Central Committee must have a Party standing of five years or more.
sentences.chinese: 中央委員會委員和候補委員必須有五年以上的黨齡。

sentences.english: In those cases, the only option is to use alternate data binding.
sentences.chinese: 在那些情況下，唯一點選擇就是使用候補數據綁定。

sentences.english: So, we scheduled an encore today for 65 people on the waiting list.
sentences.chinese: 所以我們今天爲候補的65個人安排了一場額外培訓。

sentences.english: You are wait-listed. We shall inform you by telephone if vacancy is available.
sentences.chinese: 閣下在候補名單，如有空缺本中心將以電話通知閣下。

sentences.english: This is a position for leaders-in-waiting.
sentences.chinese: 這是一個領導者的候補位置。

sentences.english: Your alternative place has been confirmed. Please pick up your ticket at the ticket counter.
sentences.chinese: 您的候補已被確定，請到補票櫃檯交票款。

sentences.english: You can alternate sucking with soft licking with the tip of your tongue.
sentences.chinese: 您可以候補委員，乳豬與軟舔與提示你的舌頭。

sentences.english: I can put you on the waiting list. May I have you name, please?
sentences.chinese: 我幫您做候補吧，能告訴我您的名字？

definition: paraphernalia of a guard of honor
to perform one's job/attendant/job/duties/(respectful appellation for the addressee) you/your Excellency/(Church) deacon
to keep a record of events/record/to start to form memories (after one's infancy)
to decide (in a meeting)/to resolve (i.e. pass a resolution)
variant of 聯絡|联络[lian2 luo4]
